/**
 * Jump - A Reaction-Based Jumping Game
 * Main application component
 */import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{useGameLoop}from'./hooks/useGameLoop';import{Player}from'./components/Player';import{Enemy}from'./components/Enemy';import{Laser}from'./components/Laser';import{GameOver}from'./components/GameOver';import{ScoreDisplay}from'./components/ScoreDisplay';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const canvasRef=useRef(null);const laserRefs=useRef([]);const{score,gameOver,playerState,lasers,enemyY,enemyScale,wasHit,dimensions,backgroundStars,handleJumpStart,handleJumpEnd,handleMouseMove,handleTouchMove,handleRestart}=useGameLoop();/**
   * Render background stars
   */useEffect(()=>{if(!canvasRef.current||!backgroundStars)return;const ctx=canvasRef.current.getContext('2d');if(!ctx)return;const renderLoop=()=>{backgroundStars.render(ctx);if(!gameOver){requestAnimationFrame(renderLoop);}};requestAnimationFrame(renderLoop);},[backgroundStars,gameOver]);/**
   * Setup input controls
   */useEffect(()=>{const handleKeyDown=()=>handleJumpStart();const handleKeyUp=()=>handleJumpEnd();const handleMouseDown=()=>handleJumpStart();const handleMouseUp=()=>handleJumpEnd();const handleTouchStart=()=>handleJumpStart();const handleTouchEnd=()=>handleJumpEnd();window.addEventListener('keydown',handleKeyDown);window.addEventListener('keyup',handleKeyUp);window.addEventListener('mousedown',handleMouseDown);window.addEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);window.addEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);window.addEventListener('touchstart',handleTouchStart);window.addEventListener('touchend',handleTouchEnd);window.addEventListener('touchmove',handleTouchMove);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('keydown',handleKeyDown);window.removeEventListener('keyup',handleKeyUp);window.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleMouseDown);window.removeEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);window.removeEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);window.removeEventListener('touchstart',handleTouchStart);window.removeEventListener('touchend',handleTouchEnd);window.removeEventListener('touchmove',handleTouchMove);};},[handleJumpStart,handleJumpEnd,handleMouseMove,handleTouchMove]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:'fixed',inset:0,overflow:'hidden',background:'#000'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvasRef,width:dimensions.width,height:dimensions.height,style:{position:'absolute',inset:0}}),!gameOver&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScoreDisplay,{score:score}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Player,{playerState:playerState,isHit:wasHit}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Enemy,{x:dimensions.enemyX,y:enemyY,scaleX:enemyScale.scaleX,scaleY:enemyScale.scaleY}),lasers.map((laser,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Laser,{x:laser.x,y:laser.y,ref:el=>{laserRefs.current[index]=el;}},index))]}),gameOver&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GameOver,{onRestart:handleRestart})]});};export default App;
